name: Tremor Soulex OS
description:
Looks like it actually wasn't the end of the road, even with SVT!

Tremor Soulex is another Tremor operating-system. This OS is special, because it has MBPUF (manually built processing unit file), which makes everything be processed by a single unit file.

There isn't many big things with it, it's just a little remake of Tremor 3, but it's better.
